name: Ballistic Chickens
description:
Welcome to our game off 2018 entry.

You play as a chicken farmer who has had the unfortunate luck of having an ancient alien artifact land on his property. The farmer has found that anything grown in his garden change in a very strange way. When fed to his chickens, the power of the artifact transforms the chicken in a weapon of unimaginable power.

The artifact has attracted alien's from all around. It is your job to keep the artifact safe else it fall into the wrong hands.

In this farming defense game you must defend the artifact while growing food to make super chickens. Each night defended will result in your plants growing. Some plants take 1 night while others take 2 to become fully grown. You'll know because fully grown plants radiate power in the form of sparkles. :)

After each wave the player is given some money that can be spent on upgrades or new seeds. You will have to balance both if you are to survive.

At anytime during the game press ESC to bring up the menu and select help if you need a recap of the controls or how the game is played.

There are several plant types and each one has a different affect on your chickens.

  • Cauliflower
    • Heat seeking chickens
  • Jalapeno
    • Explosive chickens
  • Parsnip
    • Chickens that slow enemies
  • Tomato
    • Chickens on steroids
  • Potato
    • Radiated chickens

Each chicken has 3 ranks that can be upgraded. With the third rank doing something special...

Controls

  • WASD - To move around
  • Use the mouse to look
  • E - To speak to the shops, plant and pick, and activate the turret
  • 1-6 - To select the seed to plant or the chicken to fire
  • While a seed is selected, pressing the key again will deselect it.
  • ESC - To bring up the in game menu

Tools used:

  1. Unity3D
  2. Blender
  3. Sketchbook
  4. Gimp
  5. Audacity

*The only assets we did not create were the ambiance sound that plays during the level and the hand icon. 

Credits:

  • Dylan - Game play
  • Kyle - Story
  • Aaron - Art

Shortly after submission we found several bugs that broke the game. We fixed the bugs and uploaded a new zip.
